title: County Health Open Source Project
text:
Welcome to the County Health Open Source Project, a community-driven effort to preserve, update, and extend the County Health Rankings & Roadmaps data after the loss of program funding.
Our mission is to:

title: County Health Open Source Project
text:
Resources

How to Contribute:
Guidance for setting up your environment, submitting PRs, and joining discussions.
→ https://your-contribute-guide-url
Interactive Shiny App:
Explore key indicators with an easy-to-use visual interface.
→ https://your-shiny-app-url
Data Calculations (GitHub Repo):
Scripts and workflows that compute the indicators used in the Shiny app.
→ https://github.com/County-Health-Rankings-and-Roadmaps/county_health_measure_calculations
Historical Data Archive (Zenodo):
A permanent archive of 15 years of data releases.
→ https://zenodo.org/communities/countyhealthrankingsandroadmaps/records?q=&l=list&p=1&s=10&sort=newest
Archived Documentation Site:
Historical documentation, methods, and notes.
→ https://your-archived-html-url


If you’d like to help, please check out the How to Contribute guide or open an issue in our GitHub repository.
Let’s keep this important public data alive together!

title: How to Contribute
text:
Thank you for your interest in contributing to the County Health Open Source Project!



Add or update data calculations

Improve documentation

Report issues or bugs

Build educational or visualization tools

Use our historical data archive to advocate for health equity





Fork the GitHub repository

Create a feature branch

Run the calculation scripts locally

Submit a pull request




Open an issue on GitHub or join the discussion forum.
